Cesar, I agree it would be nice to make python NEAT available on the 
websi=
te.  I believe I asked Karl Lewin for permission to do that 
about three ye=
ars ago, but he told me the code wasn't in suitable 
condition to be releas=
ed.  Since then, we seem to have lost touch.  
You are correct that he is t=
he one who produced a python NEAT version.

I think I remember others menti=
oning they were working on Python 
versions of NEAT but I can't remember wh=
o it was.  If someone has 
such a version and wants to make it available, I=
 will be happy to 
link it from my website.

ken
